modules.name: vOId
modules.description:
The ultimate mastering tool for Rack.
Once plugged in your Rack, you gonna
 sound FAAAAT.

Picture is taken from a very good LP
TERA MELOS.

modules.name: ChUTE
modules.description:
Space/Strange trigger based on the
free fall and bounce of an object.
You can change the drop altitude
between 1cm and 3m and adjust
the C.O.R. (Coeficiant Of Restitution).

Outputs provide a gate based on the
downside of movements:
 The relitive tension of Altitude and
the top of the rebounds.

modules.name: antN
modules.description:
mp3/pls/m3u stream player.
Put a valid url in the text
field and push listen.
That is all :)

modules.name: tOCAnTe
modules.description:
Clock with triplets and
measure management.

modules.name: cuRt
modules.description: cuRt

modules.name: ACnE
modules.description:
A very simple and compact
patch-bay/mixer. 16 in by
8 out. There is 16 scenes
to choose from and a
copy/paste function which
allows you to quickly
initialize scenes.

modules.name: baR
modules.description:
A stereo peak compressor
showing 300ms and 100ms
RMS of the signal.

modules.name: BISTROT
modules.description: Bit crusher

modules.name: bordL
modules.description:
Based on dTrOY but it is a
little bit more powerful.
See Manual for more details....

modules.name: cANARd
modules.description:
Live sampler. You can chose
between two REC modes, the
1st, each record replaces the
previous, the 2nd mode allows
to stack samples.

modules.name: clACos
modules.description:
Phase distortion oscillator
like TiARE but here you have
only one output and each cycle
is split in 4 parts. You can
choose your wave form and phase
distortion per part.

modules.name: dFUZE
modules.description: dFUZE

modules.name: dTrOY
modules.description:
Detroit Toy. A single line sequencer
but with nice features inspired
by Roland 185, DU-SEQ, Metropolis
hardware sequencers.
See Manual for more details....

modules.name: dUKe
modules.description:
A simple but very efficient 4x CV
controller. You can choose between
-5v/5V or 0V/10V and set the MAX and
MIN for each slider.

modules.name: EMILE
modules.description: EMILE

modules.name: FFilTr
modules.description: FFilTr

modules.name: ForK
modules.description:
An oscillator based on a particular
approach of formant synthesis.
Vowel sounds are more fun at low
and mid frequencies. You can
tweak frequency F and gain G on
4 bands. Presets button lets you
hear typical French vowels settings.

Warning!! this model creates DC
offset at high frequencies.

modules.name: Garçon
modules.description: FFT display

modules.name: HCTIP
modules.description: Pitch shifter

modules.name: lATe
modules.description:
Clock Modulator, Takes a clock input
and applies a delay on even ticks to
create swing. Reset sets the next tick
for the incoming clock to odd.

modules.name: lIMbO
modules.description:
4th order stereo LP ladder filter.
Gain boosts the signal to compensate for
global signal energy lose at high
resonance. When non linear is selected gain is applied to each stage

modules.name: liMonADe
modules.description: liMonADe

modules.name: LoURdE
modules.description: LoURdE

modules.name: MOiRE
modules.description:
16 scenes with 16 CV controllers
and a fader to morph between
them. Outputs can be switched
between -5v/+5v and 0v/10v.

modules.name: MS
modules.description: Mid/Side Decoder/Encoder

modules.name: µ
modules.description:
Synced pulse generator.
See manual for more details...

modules.name: OUAIve
modules.description:
Sample player with Trig mode,
Slice mode and Gate mode.
See manual for more details...

modules.name: PeNEqUe
modules.description: PeNEqUe

modules.name: pErCO
modules.description:
Filter with Low Pass, Band Pass
and High Pass outputs.

modules.name: rabBIT
modules.description: rabBIT

modules.name: REI
modules.description: REI

modules.name: Σ multiprise :)
modules.description: Σ Mult

modules.name: TiARE
modules.description: Analog mode coming soon!

modules.name: ziNC
modules.description:
16 band vocoder.
Control Attack(A) and Decay(D)
of the envelope follower. MOD,
CAR and OUT are gain stages
for each path.

modules.name: zOù MAï
modules.description: zOù MAï
